Arbi Masala Me The favourite vegetbale of Punjab, collocassia cooked in a blend of home ground masalas

Bhindi Masala Tender lady fingers tossed with onions and tomatoes, mildly spiced

Dum Aloo Baby potatoes in a delicious brown gravy dum cooked
Jeera Dal Tadka A light yellow lentil dal tempered with roasted cumin
Kadi Pakodi Fried gram flour dumplings cooked in a traditional sour yoghurt & gram flour gravy
Kaju Makhanna Te Paneer Exotic seeds of the beautiful lotus flower roasted & batons of paneer simmered in creamy brown gravy & tempered with aromatic spices
Makkai Khumb Te Palak Tender kernels of corn along with garden fresh mushrooms simmered in a sea of garden fresh spinach
Makkai Paneer Bhurji Tender kernels of corn & crushed paneer cooked with ripe rded tomatoes & mildly spiced
Makkai Simla Mirch Paneer Tender kernels of corn, green bell peppers & paneer cooked in mildly spiced gravy

Masale Wale Jheenge Prawns cooked in home style punjabi gravy.
Memsaab Di Ishtew A variety of exotic english vegetables cooked in a creamy cashew gravy, delicately flavoured with mild spices
Methi Aloo The humble potato diced & tossed up with the magical herb fenugreek, an excellent yet simple dish
Miloree Spicy Subz An eclectic array of vegetables simmered in a bed of garden fresh pureed spinach & amply spiced up to tickle the palate
Naulakha Subz Kalonji Select mix of vegetables slow cooked in mild spices & flavoured with roasted onion seeds
Paneer Tikka Masala Batons of paneer char grilled in tandoori masalas served in a delightful tomato based gravy
Pindi Chole An old time village favourite, Kabuli channa or chick peas soaked overnight & basted in a tangy tomato & onion based semi dry gravy flavoured with mango powder.

Punjabi Macchi Kadi Prime cuts of seer fish in delicious home-style gravy.
Rajma Ma's special, traditionally prepared in the Punjabi household on Sundays. Kidney beans slow cooked & blended with a saute of tomatoes & onios. Goes very well with steamed rice
Rara Paneer Batons of cumin seasoned paneer cooked in a rich tomato & crushed paneer gravy
Subz Keema Masala Mince of assorted vegetables & crushed paneer in a semi dry onion based gravy

Bhatinde Da Kukkad Juicy chunks of tender chicken cooked in a tangy home style thick gravy enriched with ripe red tomatoes. Subtly spiced

Lahori Kukkad. An old time favourite of lahore, juicy cuts of chicken served in rich aromatic brown gravy, slow cooked in the old fashioned way
Machchi Tikka Masala Boneless chunks of seer fish pickled & fired in tandoor, in rich tomato gravy
Makkhan Murg What can one describe this true price of Punjab. Simply put it's the internationally acclaimed Butter Chicken
